content: Thanks to you, their homes have become much cozier. I'd say each unique house is also part of what makes this planet so beautiful.
info: 介绍米友家装_莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A惊叹}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the residents told me...{短暂停} they're truly grateful for everything you've done for them!
info: 介绍米友家装_莫白_主流程文本II

content: Ensuring comfortable living for all is also part of Loomi Co.'s vision. Oh, and let me introduce you to "<style=Highlight>Homi Decor</style>." You can install it on your phone...
info: 介绍米友家装_莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A灵光一现}Many of our Neighbors are looking to renovate their homes. They'll post their <style=Highlight>design requests</style> in <style=Highlight>Homi Decor</style>.
info: 介绍米友家装_莫白_主流程文本II

content: If you have a knack for interior design, they'd greatly appreciate your help and have thank-you gifts ready for you. Hoho! If you ever need anything, feel free to stop by the camp anytime.
info: 介绍米友家装_莫白_主流程文本II

content: Perhaps sensing that peaceful vitality, this jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Take it and continue watering the Luca Arbor.
info: 介绍米友家装_莫白_主流程文本II
